alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 16 at 4:06AM CDT until May 16 at 5:40PM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding due to runoff from recent heavy rainfall is occurring. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Texas, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 1100 AM CDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Streams continue to rise due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 405 AM CDT, Stream elevation sensors indicate that Caney Creek near FM 2090 is over its banks due to runoff from recent rainfall. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... mainly rural areas of Eastern Montgomery County - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
